panels.title: [connection] send offer http request versus send flow (time)
[connection] time taken in background job Invitee/Inviter flow (guage)
[present proof] background job total records processed (rate)

targets.expr: ((sum by (namespace) (irate(tapir_request_duration_seconds_sum{container="prism-agent-server", cluster="$cluster", path="$path"}[$__rate_interval]))) / (sum by (namespace) (irate(tapir_request_duration_seconds_count{container="prism-agent-server", cluster="$cluster", path="$path"}[$__rate_interval]))))

panels.title: HTTP Metrics (per path - select at top of dashboard)

panels.description: counter that tracks amount of successful attempts for an invitee to send a connection request to the inviter
panels.title: [connection] - successful invitee -> inviter request [rate]

panels.description: counter that tracks amount of failed attempts for an invitee to send a connection request to the inviter
panels.title: [connection] failed invitee -> inviter request [rate]

panels.description: counter that tracks amount of successful attempts for an inviter to send a connection request to the invitee
panels.title: [connection] successful inviter -> invitee response [rate]

panels.description: counter that tracks amount of failed attempts for an inviter to send a connection response to the invitee
panels.title: [connection] failed inviter -> invitee response [rate]

panels.description: counter that tracks the number of successful attempts to process connection record by the inviter, this includes getting a record from db, sending a message, and updating the status of the record
panels.title: [connection] successful process connection record (rate)

panels.description: counter that tracks the number of failed attempts to process connection record by the inviter, this includes getting a record from db, sending a message, and updating the status of the record
panels.title: [connection] failed process connection record (rate)

panels.description: the time it takes (in ms) for the record to be moved from the pending state to the response sent state on the inviter side (Gauge). Connection Id is provided for each metric
panels.title: [connection] pending state to response sent state (time)

panels.description: the time it takes (in ms) for an inviter to send a connection response to the invitee (Gauge). Connection Id is provided for each metric
panels.title: [connection] inviter send connection response (time)

panels.description: the time it takes (in ms) for an inviter to process a record (Gauge). Connection Id is provided for each metric
panels.title: [connection] inviter process record (time)

panels.description: the time it takes (in ms) for an inviter to process a record (Gauge). Connection Id is provided for each metric
panels.title: [connection] inviter process record (time)

panels.description: All invitee gauge added together - time taken to send a connection request + time taking to move it from pending to sent + time taken to process a record
panels.title: [connection] invitee e2e processing (time)

panels.description: All inviter gauge added together - time taken to send a connection request + time taking to move it from pending to sent + time taken to process a record
panels.title: [connection] inviter e2e processing (time)
